relation: System for matching orders for futures contracts which facilitate electronic trading of over the counter futures contracts
System for matching orders for futures contracts which facilitate electronic trading of over the counter futures contracts
pageTitle: Patent US7908201 - Cross and post order - Google Patents
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27186=This application claims priority from and claims the benefit of U.S. Provisional Application No. 60/678,083, filed May 5, 2005, entitled “Restricted Cross and Post Order”, which is hereby incorporated by reference., 81988=At step 152, the process converts the remaining shares of the internal meta buy order to a standard restricted limit order to buy 1200 at $19.99. The process assigns a current timestamp to the newly generated restricted buy order and posts it to the order book in price/time priority with respect to the other orders on the book., 89533=The process matches 1000 shares of Order 7 with 1000 shares of Restricted Order B:, 85844=The process also posts the generated restricted buy order to the public book, where it looks like any other posted limit order and is included in the top of book quote. The posting market center's best bid and offer at this point is 1200 at $19.99 to 900 at $20.05. The public book looks like this:, 81777=After the execution of the cross, the meta buy order still has 1200 shares available to trade (original order size of 8000 less 6800 shares crossed=1200 shares not yet executed).}
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations While the invention has been discussed in terms of certain embodiments, it should be appreciated that the invention is not so limited. The embodiments are explained herein by way of example, and there are numerous modifications, variations and other embodiments that may be employed that would still be within the scope of the present invention. Restricted Cross and Post Order C is completely filled. Execution 4: Sold 900@20.06 (matched incoming Buy Order 9) Execution 3: Sold 9100@20.06 (crossed cleanly) A total of 10,000 shares have been sold: Execution 3: Bought 9100@20.06 (crossed cleanly) Execution 2: Bought 300@20.06 (matched posted Sell Order 5) Execution 1: Bought 600@20.06 (matched posted Sell Order 4) A total of 10,000 shares have been bought: Order C Execution 4: Sold 900@20.06 (matched incoming Buy Order 9) Order C Execution 3: Crossed 9100@20.06 (crossed cleanly) Order C Execution 2: Bought 300@20.06 (matched posted Sell Order 5) Order C Execution 1: Bought 600@20.06 (matched posted Sell Order 4) The posting market center 20 reports the executions for the restricted cross and post order, Order C, and the meta order trading information to the client: 400 @ 19.97 Posting Market Center Center 700 @ 19.99 Posting Market Center
